title: Love Will Come Around
lyrics:
You know that I got 
A couple months out on tour 
Wish I could see your face more
But that's what FaceTime is for
I know your girls have been saying I'm a waste of time (oh yeah)

but you ain't been around a guy with a heart like mine (oh yeah)



I remember the day when I fell in love with you 

Any troubles you had side by side see them through

I'd fight for your love, promise we won't hit the ground 

Don't you worry now baby 



'Cause you know Love Will Come Around

'Cause you know Love Will Come Around

'Cause you know Love Will Come Around

Slowly, slowly, slowly, slowly yeah

Don't you worry now baby 

'Cause you know Love Will Come Around



You know that you got (oh yeah)

To let this story play out,

Relax and hold this thing down, 

Promise I won't let you down,



We got the juice and I can't deny 

That's why I'm with you, this is not goodbye

Stronger than ever, we can't divide, we can't divide



I remember the day when I fell in love with you

Any troubles you had side by side see them through

I'd fight for your love, promise we won't hit the ground 

Don't you worry now baby 



'Cause you know Love Will Come Around

'Cause you know Love Will Come Around

'Cause you know Love Will Come Around

Slowly, slowly, slowly, slowly yeah

Don't you worry now baby 

'Cause you know Love Will Come Around



I love like yours' heart to come by

And everything we do feels like [?]

Something comes out when you're around

And when I'm back from tour, I'll let you know when I touch down



I remember the day when I fell in love with you

Any troubles you had side by side see them through

I'd fight for your love, promise we won't hit the ground 

Don't you worry now baby 



'Cause you know Love Will Come Around

'Cause you know Love Will Come Around

'Cause you know Love Will Come Around

Slowly, slowly, slowly, slowly yeah

Don't you worry now baby 

'Cause you know Love Will Come Around



'Cause you know Love Will Come Around

'Cause you know Love Will Come Around

Slowly, slowly, slowly, slowly yeah

Don't you worry now baby 

'Cause you know Love Will Come Around
